full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 161 of 228 837 LC2Qmax5 - corrected Alessi - Direct 1 A. I picked up Jane at her house that she live with her mother and siblings. 2 Q. Why couldn't Jane drive herself? 3 A. I don't think she had the license. 4 Q. Who else that you know of picked Jane up to bring her to 5 Mr. Epstein's house? 6 A. My wife pick her up couple times. 7 Q. When you picked Jane up, where in the car did she sit? 8 A. It was a rule that sit in the back of the car. 9 Q. Who told you that rule? 10 A. The back seat. It was by Ms. Maxwell. Everybody should 11 sit in the back. 12 Q. Other than Jane, did you drive other people for Ms. Maxwell 13 and Mr. Epstein? 14 A. Can you repeat the question, please? 15 Q. Did you drive other people other than Jane for Ms. Maxwell 16 and Mr. Epstein? 17 A. Oh absolutely, yes. 18 Q. How many? 19 A. Dozens and dozens. 20 Q. So do you have a clear memory of every single time you 21 picked up a passenger? 22 A. Not a clear memory, no, but I remember driving to Miami to 23 airports and homes to pick people up. 24 Q. Other than Mr. Epstein's house, where else, to your 25 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018034
